title: Voice Assistant
shortDescription: Personal voice assistant which wakes up on a pre-defined wake-word.
description: Personal voice assistant with wake-word detection and various commands such as opening apps, telling date & time, setting system volume and stuff. It was built using vosk library for classification & fuzzy matching, pvporcupine for wake-word detection.
highlights: Extremely low latency at a few hundred milliseconds
reason: I needed something to do simple tasks for me, and existing prebuilt solutions were... not so personal, and extremely slow.
